medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ pain after eating, associated with subjective fevers, chills, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RUQ pain started three days ago after eating and radiated to the epigastrium. The patient was initially seen three days ago with elevated LFTs and managed non-operatively. After discharge, the RUQ pain returned with additional symptoms including fever, chills, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Colitis of unknown etiology, diverticulitis, anxiety, depression.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had cholecystectomy, family history of alcoholism.
